channel.title: Posts on Cloud-Guru's Blog

item.title: My First Post
item.description: A simple example of bash block code: 1 echo "My first post with hugo" An another example of terraform block code: 1 2 3 4 resource "a_resource" "my_resource_name" { key = "value" anotherkey = "another value" } And finally, a graph with mermaid description: graph LR A--B A--C B--D C--D
